verses.verse: A Psalm of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H8199>Judge<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> for I have <S%H1980>walked<s%> in my <S%H8537>integrity:<s%> I have <S%H982>trusted<s%> also in the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> therefore I shall not <S%H4571>slide.<s%>
<S%H974>Examine<s%> me, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H5254>prove<s%> me; <S%H6884>try<s%> my <S%H3629>reins<s%> and my <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
For your loving <S%H2617>kindness<s%> is <S%H5048>before<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes:<s%> and I have <S%H1980>walked<s%> in your <S%H571>truth.<s%>
I have not <S%H3427>sat<s%> with <S%H7723>vain<s%> <S%H4962>persons,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will I <S%H935>go<s%> in with <S%H5956>dissemblers.<s%>
I have <S%H8130>hated<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of evil <S%H4827>doers;<s%> and will not <S%H3427>sit<s%> with the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>
I will <S%H7364>wash<s%> my <S%H3709>hands<s%> in <S%H5356>innocence:<s%> so will I <S%H5437>compass<s%> your <S%H4196>altar,<s%> O <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>
That I may <S%H8085>publish<s%> with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H8426>thanksgiving,<s%> and <S%H5608>tell<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H6381>wondrous<s%> works.
<S%H3068>LORD,<s%> I have <S%H157>loved<s%> the <S%H4583>habitation<s%> of your <S%H1004>house,<s%> and the <S%H4725>place<s%> where your <S%H3519>honor<s%> <S%H4908>dwells.<s%>
<S%H622>Gather<s%> not my <S%H5315>soul<s%> with <S%H2400>sinners,<s%> nor my <S%H2416>life<s%> with <S%H1818>bloody<s%> <S%H582>men:<s%>
In <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%> is <S%H2154>mischief,<s%> and their <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H7810>bribes.<s%>
But as for me, I will <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H8537>integrity:<s%> <S%H6299>redeem<s%> me, and be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> to me.
My <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H5975>stands<s%> in an <S%H4334>even<s%> place: in the <S%H4721>congregations<s%> will I <S%H1288>bless<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
